text: “iyalkk oru nidhi irakkikkeatukkattatent? allenkil iyaleateappam oru malakk varattatent?” enneakke avar parayunnatukaranam ninakku beadhanamayi labhicca sandesannalil cilat ni vittukalannekkam. allenkilatuvali ninakk maneavisamamuntayekkam. ennal ni oru munnariyippukaran matraman. allahuvea sarva sangatikalkkum cumatalappettavanum
